data.comment: The match is underway in Heerenveen.
Jan Paul van Hecke (Heerenveen) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 26, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Henk Veerman.
Benjamin Nygren instrumental with a fine assist.
Benjamin Nygren puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Simon Tibbling is booked for the away team.
In the minute 52, Michael de Leeuw (Emmen) has received a first yellow card.
He's off! Simon Tibbling is shown a second yellow card.
Goal! Heerenveen extend their lead to 3-0 through Rodney Kongolo.
In the minute 71, Oliver Batista Meier with an assist there.
Sieben Dewaele is replacing Oliver Batista Meier for the home team.
Lentini Caciano is on a sub for Michael de Leeuw for Emmen.
In the minute 72, Heerenveen make their second substitution with Ibrahim Dresevic replacing Jan Paul van Hecke.
Great finish from Henk Veerman to give Heerenveen a 4-0 lead.
Great play from Joey Veerman to set up the goal.
In the minute 77, Nikolai Laursen (Emmen) is red-carded and dismissed.
Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a second substitution, with Keziah Veendorp replacing Hilal Ben Moussa.
The home team have replaced Benjamin Nygren with Couhaib Driouech. This is the third substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
In the minute 84, Sieben Dewaele (Heerenveen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team replace Joey Veerman with Rami Hajal.
Heerenveen make their fifth substitution with Ulysses Llanez Jr. Replacing Mitchell Van Bergen.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
